ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO_PARAGRAPH: I'm a passionate software developer with a strong interest in AI-driven solutions, particularly in the intersection of healthcare and technology. My journey into coding began with a curiosity for how software can solve real-world problems—and it quickly turned into a full-fledged mission to build meaningful, user-focused applications. I'm constantly learning, experimenting, and challenging myself to write cleaner, more efficient code.
ABOUT_ME.LOCATION: Based in Austria, I’m open to remote work, hybrid models, or relocating for exciting opportunities where I can grow both technically and personally.
ABOUT_ME.OPEN_MINDEDNESS: I enjoy exploring new technologies and frameworks. Whether it's a new JavaScript library, a backend optimization trick, or an AI model, I embrace opportunities to learn and evolve.
ABOUT_ME.PROBLEM_SOLVING: My approach to problem-solving is both analytical and creative. I enjoy breaking complex issues into manageable parts and always aim for solutions that are both effective and elegant.
